Articles.Content:
(if this is the wrong area to post this, please let me know so I can move it. thanks)

Since the release of .21 and subsequent save break, I decided to go back to basics and try to recreate the Gemini docking mission (with my own Agena stand-in) using stock parts.

(Although it should be noted that I did "tweak" the size of the 1-man capsule by 10% and the sun tracking of the solar panels. but other than that everything is vanilla)

what do you guys think?

http://imgur.com/a/wMqOV#0
